TopicTitle: HELP PLEASE CAMERA TOOLS Not working for me

Articles.Content:
it keeps saying Exeption:MissingMethodExeption:Method not found:'FlightCamera.SetTarget

thats what the console keep saying to me please help me a method or something in how to install mods indept

Hi, @Mistah_loafy, and welcome aboard! I've moved your post to the proper subfourm, you should be able to get more relevant help here.

Good luck!

@Mistah_loafy, people generally need to see a list of the mods you're currently using. Also, a log or crash file would be helpful, too. To upload one, just host it at a third-party site, such as Dropbox, and link the download here.

I've noticed for some reason it depends what browser you use to download the mod. Right away, this may just be me, but every mod I've downloaded from Firefox simply does not work. On the other hand, Safari & Chrome have been very reliable. I've also noticed that mods from curseforge don't work as well either; I use spacedock. I may just be "special", but if this helps, great!
